live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 09:16 MT.
58171.summary: Some customers in the Silver Springs area of Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
58171.title: Feb 22 - Fort McMurray (Silver Springs) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
